title: You Are G8, We Are 6 Billion: The Truth Behind the Genoa Protests
description: The G8 meeting in Genoa in July 2001 resulted in the biggest antiglobalization demonstrations so far and saw the murder of an activist. You Are G8, We Are 6 Billion is the riveting truth about the protests, written by one of the organizers who was also a public spokesman. Besides giving his first hand account of the daily events, Jonathan Neale provides a devastating critique of global corporations and explains exactly why the protesters traveled from all over the globe to make their point to the world’s most powerful nations. This passionate account fully conveys the protesters’ rationale as well as the feel and smell of the protests.
author: Jonathan Neale
